article.Heading: Budget 2016: Govt must focus on education, healthcare, says Jahangir Aziz
article.Summary: The most important thing to look at is the 3.5 percent figure for fiscal deficit in this Budget, says Jahangir Aziz, Asia Economic Research at JPMorgan.
article.Body:
The most important thing to look at is the 3.5 percent figure for fiscal deficit in this Budget, says Jahangir Aziz, Asia Economic Research at JPMorgan. Not meeting the target will not be a good sign, he adds.

Public investments, he says, is not the real problem. Sustaining demand is the main issue, he adds. The government can look at higher allocation for education and healthcare, he says.

For entire interview, watch accompanying videos.
